column5: I saw the other night a guy who just landed a salmon and he had a unique shaped flasher on, like a large apex lure, but as a flasher.  Has anyone seen anything like this, or know what it would be?  It wasn't a Yakima bait or kone zone flasher, as I am familiar with them  Thanks
I have a few custom meat paddles made by bob fuller, they are not like any i have seen elsewhere. Could be one of them or another custom job.
You wouldnt have a picture of one would you?
Ill see if i can find a pic.
what comes to mind is Oki Kingflasher, they're long kind of like an Apex but the bend is on the tail  I think Shortwave used to sell them
i found it....from Finland or sweden.  Salsa Flasher
Cool, i couldnt find any pics anyway lol.
